properties.description: An attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated in a sought-after location in Petts Wood. This property features a spacious through lounge, a modern fitted kitchen, and a beautiful rear garden perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, you will find three well-proportioned bedrooms and a contemporary family bathroom. The property further benefits from off-street parking and excellent transport links to Central London.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order, this two-bedroom flat offers modern living in a convenient Orpington location. The property comprises a bright and airy open-plan living area, a sleek kitchen with integrated appliances, and two double bedrooms. Additional highlights include a stylish bathroom, allocated parking, and close proximity to local amenities and Orpington station.

A stylish and modern two bedroom apartment situated in the heart of London. This property boasts an open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, a high-spec kitchen with integrated appliances, and a private balcony with stunning city views. The building offers 24-hour concierge service and a residents' gym. Ideal for professionals working in the city.

A magnificent four bedroom detached farmhouse set within extensive grounds in the picturesque Cumbrian countryside. This characterful property features exposed beams, a large farmhouse kitchen with an Aga, and a cozy lounge with a log burner. Outside, there are landscaped gardens, a paddock, and outbuildings with potential for conversion.

A contemporary one bedroom apartment located in the vibrant Northern Quarter of Manchester. The property comprises a bright open-plan living/dining area, a sleek modern kitchen, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes, and a stylish bathroom. The development is close to an array of trendy bars, restaurants, and transport links.

An impressive five bedroom detached family home offering spacious and versatile accommodation. The property features a large lounge, a separate dining room, a study, and a stunning kitchen/breakfast room opening onto the garden. Upstairs, the master bedroom benefits from an en-suite, and there are four further double bedrooms. Double garage and driveway.

A superbly presented two bedroom apartment situated in a prime city centre location. The property offers a generous open-plan living space, a fully fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms (master with en-suite), and a modern main bathroom. Include allocated parking and access to communal gardens. Walking distance to shops and station.
